        aria-label="Ad for Scribd subscription"
        rel="noopener noreferrer"
        alt="Ad for Scribd subscription"
        href="https://www.scribd.com/slideshare">
          <div class="fallback-ad en"></div>
      </a>
  </div>
</div>
      <button type="button" class="skip-ad-button waiting-to-skip" disabled="disabled">
        <span class="ad-skip-message">Skip to next slide</span>
        <span class="ad-skip-countdown-message">You can skip to the next slide in</span>
        <span class="ad-countdown">3</span></button>
    </div>
    <div class="ad-label-wrapper">
      <div class="ad-label-container">
        <span>Ad</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
  <div class="inbetween-overlay" id="inbetween-overlay-8">
    <div class="ad-inner">

          <div class="fallback-ad en"></div>
      </a>

              Infrastructure..." data-index="12" loading="lazy" src="https://image.slidesharecdn.com/20120421-phpcon-hokkaido-pub-120421025841-phpapp01/85/20120421-12-320.jpg?cb=1668045619" srcset="https://image.slidesharecdn.com/20120421-phpcon-hokkaido-pub-120421025841-phpapp01/85/20120421-12-320.jpg?cb=1668045619 320w, https://image.slidesharecdn.com/20120421-phpcon-hokkaido-pub-120421025841-phpapp01/85/20120421-12-638.jpg?cb=1668045619 638w" sizes="100vw" id="slide-image-11"></picture>
              </noscript>
          
</div>        <div class="slide" id="slide-12" data-index="12">
              <noscript class="loading-lazy">

              <noscript class="loading-lazy">
                <picture><source srcset="https://image.slidesharecdn.com/20120421-phpcon-hokkaido-pub-120421025841-phpapp01/85/20120421-29-320.jpg?cb=1668045619 320w, https://image.slidesharecdn.com/20120421-phpcon-hokkaido-pub-120421025841-phpapp01/85/20120421-29-638.jpg?cb=1668045619 638w, https://image.slidesharecdn.com/20120421-phpcon-hokkaido-pub-120421025841-phpapp01/75/20120421-29-2048.jpg?cb=1668045619 2048w" sizes="100vw" type="image/webp"><img class="slide-image" alt="PUT /server/:server-id/reset

              </noscript>
          
</div>        <div class="slide" id="slide-29" data-index="29">
              <noscript class="loading-lazy">

    <img

  <ul id="filmstrip-list">

    <div class="button-container">
      


    </div>
  </div>
  <div id="overlay-player-bottom">
    <div id="player-fullscreen-navigation" class="player-toolbar-item">
      <span class="slide-index" aria-live="polite" aria-atomic="true">
        <span data-cy="current-slide-number" class="current-slide-number j-current-slide">1</span> of <span class="total-slides j-total-slides">58</span>
      </span>
      <span class="ad-notification">Ad</span>
    </div>
    <div class="content-right">
      <div class="zoom-slide">
        <button
          type="button"

          <i class='icon-zoom-in'></i>
        </button>

          type="button"
          class="zoom-out"

          <i class='icon-zoom-out'></i>
        </button>
      </div>

        type="button"
        id="exit-fullscreen"
        aria-label="Exit Fullscreen"
      >
        <i class="icon-compress exit-fullscreen-icon"></i>
      </button>
    </div>
  </div>
  <div id="overlay-player-right">
    <button
      type="button"
      id="overlay-next-slide"
      data-cy="overlay-next-button"
      aria-label="Next Slide"
      > 
      <i class="icon-chevron-right"></i>
    </button>
  </div>
</div>

</div>

    window.feature_flags = {
      disable_facebook: true,
      document_interstitials_flag: true,
